alert.note: Alert for Gove; Graham; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 21 at 5:57PM CST until January 21 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light snow will gradually taper off after sunset this evening. Little in the way of additional snow accumulation is anticipated. * WHERE...In Kansas, Sheridan, Graham, and Gove Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST /9 PM CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...With significant snow cover on area roads, dangerous travel conditions will persist well after precipitation has ended. Snow melt on roads, sidewalks, and parking lots will turn into ice as temperatures fall into the teens this evening and overnight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, slow down, turn off cruise control, and exercise additional caution, particularly at intersections and highway on-ramps and off-ramps where accidents are more likely to occur. Decelerating abruptly or making sharp turns at a high rate of speed may result in loss of vehicle control. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
